message.content:
Monday:
Breakfast - Oatmeal with mixed berries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with spinach, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette.
Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, and sweet potatoes).
Snack - Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.

Tuesday:
Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with avocado and whole grain toast.
Lunch - Quinoa salad with mixed veggies, chickpeas, and lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner - Stir-fry tofu with mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, zucchini) and brown rice.
Snack - Carrot sticks with hummus.

Wednesday:
Breakfast - Greek yogurt with mixed berries and chia seeds.
Lunch - Turkey wrap with lettuce, tomato, and mustard in a gluten-free wrap.
Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans, salsa, and avocado.
Snack - Rice cakes with peanut butter.

Thursday:
Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with mixed berries, banana, spinach, and coconut milk.
Lunch - Lentil soup with whole grain bread.
Dinner - Grilled shrimp skewers with roasted asparagus.
Snack - Pear slices with cashew butter (substitute sunflower seed butter).

Friday:
Breakfast - Whole grain pancakes with mixed berries and maple syrup.
Lunch - Tuna salad with lettuce, cucumber, and whole grain crackers.
Dinner - Stuffed bell peppers with quinoa, black beans, and salsa.
Snack - Banana with almond butter (substitute sunflower seed butter).

Saturday:
Breakfast - Veggie omelette with spinach, mushrooms, and whole grain toast.
Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and olive oil vinaigrette.
Dinner - Baked cod with roasted vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, and green beans).
Snack - Orange slices with sunflower seed butter.

Sunday:
Breakfast - Avocado toast on whole grain bread with a side of mixed berries.
Lunch - Quinoa bowl with roasted vegetables (sweet potatoes, bell peppers, and zucchini) and hummus.
Dinner - Grilled steak with roasted asparagus and sweet potato wedges.
Snack - Apple slices with almond butter (substitute sunflower seed butter).
